trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 提供使公共语言运行时宿主可以参与执行上下文的流动（或移植）的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.AppDomainManager>具有对引用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager>中其<xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>属性，则公共语言运行时调用该管理器每次调用到<xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法出现，以使该主机可参与的执行流上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 从当前线程捕获宿主执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 对象，表示当前线程的宿主执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>使用安全句柄包含创建`IUnknown`主机执行当前线程的指针。

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: 要恢复为的以前的上下文状态。

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: 将宿主执行上下文还原为其以前的状态。

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState` 必须将通过返回的对象<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 未对当前线程创建 <paramref name="previousState" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="previousState" /> is not the last state for the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="previousState" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 的最后的状态。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 将当前宿主执行上下文设置为指定的宿主执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，用于将 <see cref="T:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext" /> 还原为其以前的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法设置为当前的主机执行上下文<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>已作为另一个参数使用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法调用不能作为此方法的参数中传递。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来创建一份<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>对象，然后使用该副本设置的主机执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>方法使用此方法返回的对象还原<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>到其以前的状态。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> 不是通过捕获操作获取的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> has been the argument to a previous <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> method call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostExecutionContext" /> 已作为上一次 <see cref="M:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext(System.Threading.HostExecutionContext)" /> 方法调用的参数。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。
